sentences.english: In most browsers to select one paragraph at a time, triple-click on it.
sentences.chinese: 在大多数浏览器中，三击以选择段落。

sentences.english: On average, Habbos users spend about 39 minutes per visit to the site.
sentences.chinese: 平均来说，哈宝用户每次花上39分钟来浏览网站。

sentences.english: You can get your newsletters or bills over there.
sentences.chinese: 你可以在那里浏览时事通讯或账单。

sentences.english: Welcome to the student-created video tour of the University of Cincinnati.
sentences.chinese: 欢迎您浏览辛辛那提大学主校园的视频介绍。

sentences.english: “Soft” hover effects often support the navigation design by making browsing more pleasant.
sentences.chinese: 导航设计中的鼠标悬停效果会让浏览变得更愉快。

sentences.english: To facilitate this task, BIRT provides the Data Explorer View.
sentences.chinese: BIRT提供了数据浏览视图以简化该任务。

sentences.english: She riffed through the items on the counter.
sentences.chinese: 她迅速地浏览了一遍柜台上的货品。

sentences.english: A pageview indicates that a visitor has viewed a certain page on the website.
sentences.chinese: 页面视图意味着访问者已经浏览了网站上的一些页面。

sentences.english: Some browsers will also put the pieces together if you start download several times.
sentences.chinese: 有一些浏览器也支持断点续传。

sentences.english: Thank you for visiting the EHC website and reviewing our privacy policy.
sentences.chinese: 感谢您浏览我们依合斯网站并关注我们的隐私政策。

sentences.english: It's sufficient to aim for close-enough uniformity across browsers.
sentences.chinese: 在各浏览器中获得接近一致的外观就足够了。

sentences.english: With this, you get all the images and comments in one shot.
sentences.chinese: 您可以使用这个模板浏览所有的照片和评论。

sentences.english: Can be divided into tutor system and background information to the database management system.
sentences.chinese: 可分为家教信息浏览系统和后台数据库管理系统。

sentences.english: Beef up your Dolphin by installing your favorite Add-ons.
sentences.chinese: 通过安装你喜爱的插件来加强你的海豚浏览器。

definition: to block/to be stuck/to be wedged/customs station/a clip/a fastener/a checkpost/Taiwan pr. [ka3]
to stop/to block/(computing) (coll.) slow/(loanword) card/CL:張|张[zhang1],片[pian4]/truck (from "car")/calorie (abbr. for 卡路里[ka3 lu4 li3])/cassette
to thumb through/to flip through (a book)
to click (using a mouse or other pointing device)
to hit/to press/to strike (on the keyboard)/to click (a web page button)
to search (a place)/to search (a database etc)
to duplicate/to make a copy of/to copy/to reproduce/to clone
to consult/to refer to/to look sth up in a reference source
